post:
Hello LET,

My name is Haris, from PieLayer, and I have several  offers for LowEndTalk readers.

**About us:**

PieLayer has opened its doors in 2012. We use modern hardware with an Intel Xeon E3, E5 CPU, 64-128GB of RAM, and SATA / SSDs in RAID 10 for both speed and redundancy. We have services available in various locations, including Germany and the US.


**NEW AUTUMN SALE OFFERS**

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- 

**Standard VPS One deal**

    1GB DDR3 RAM
    2 VCPU cores
    15GB Raid 10 space ( pure SSD in Las Vegas )
    1000 GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink ( 100 Mbit in Germany )
    1x IPv4
    10 x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    Coupon: LEB$1999VPSONE
    
    $19.99/year
    
    Order in Buffalo, NY - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9
    Order in Las Vegas, US - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27
    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=14
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

    2GB RAM
    2 vCPU cores

    1000GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink ( 100 Mbit in Germany )
    1x IPv4
    10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM

    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15
    Order in Las Vegas - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28

**KVM 200GB Storage deal**

    512 MB DDR3 RAM

    200 GB HDD space
    1 TB traffic
    100 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    KVM/SolusVM
    
    $6/month
    
    Order in Frankfurt - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=83
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-


**OpenVZ Storage 100GB deal**

    1GB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    100 GB HDD space ( guaranteed resources, feel free to consume all allocated space! )
    800 GB traffic @ 1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6

We accept payment via PayPal, PerfectMoney, and Bitcoin. We have a 5-day refund policy ( valid only if there is hardware issue ). Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.75 per month; bulk pricing is available. For more information, have a read our [Terms of Service](http://pielayer.com/index.php/terms).
